movie.title: Bipolar Rock 'N Roller
movie.description_intro: An unflinching account of boxing and combat sports announcer Mauro Ranallo's struggle with bipolar disorder.
movie.description_full: An unflinching account of boxing and combat sports announcer Mauro Ranallo's struggle with bipolar disorder.

movies.title: Making Waves: The Art of Cinematic Sound
movies.title_english: Making Waves: The Art of Cinematic Sound
movies.title_long: Making Waves: The Art of Cinematic Sound (2019)
movies.summary: An exploration of the history, artistry, and emotional power of cinema sound, as revealed by legendary sound designers and visionary directors, via interviews, clips from movies, and a look at their actual process of creation and discovery.
movies.description_full: An exploration of the history, artistry, and emotional power of cinema sound, as revealed by legendary sound designers and visionary directors, via interviews, clips from movies, and a look at their actual process of creation and discovery.
movies.synopsis: An exploration of the history, artistry, and emotional power of cinema sound, as revealed by legendary sound designers and visionary directors, via interviews, clips from movies, and a look at their actual process of creation and discovery.

movies.title: A Space Program
movies.summary: The artist Tom Sachs and his team of bricoleurs build a handmade space program and send two female astronauts to Mars.
movies.description_full: The artist Tom Sachs and his team of bricoleurs build a handmade space program and send two female astronauts to Mars.
movies.synopsis: The artist Tom Sachs and his team of bricoleurs build a handmade space program and send two female astronauts to Mars.

movies.title: Hoop Dreams
movies.summary: This documentary follows two young African-Americans through their high school years as they perfect their skills in basketball in the hopes of getting a college scholarship and eventually play in the NBA. Arthur Agee and William Gates both show great potential and are are actively recruited as they look to enter high school. They start off at the same high school but unable to pay an unexpected bill for tuition fees, Arthur has to withdraw and go to the local public high school. The film follows them through their four years of high school and their trials and tribulations: injuries, slumps and the never ending battle to maintain their grades. Through it all, their hoop dreams continue.

movies.title: Boys State
movies.summary: A thousand 17-year-old boys from Texas join together to build a representative government from the ground up.
movies.description_full: A thousand 17-year-old boys from Texas join together to build a representative government from the ground up.
movies.synopsis: A thousand 17-year-old boys from Texas join together to build a representative government from the ground up.
